events.description: On February 9th the Gabriel Society hosted a wonderful Baby Shower for twins! It was a fun time for all! Many thanks to everyone who helped make this a success!
events.name: Pictures from the Baby Shower for Twins Hosted by the Gabriel Society

events.description: The Parish Office will be closed on Monday, February 17th in observance of Presidents’ Day.
events.name: Presidents’ Day Schedule

events.description: The meeting for the Bereavement Support Group scheduled for February 23rd has been CANCELLED. There will be a Prayer Service of Remembrance for all Parishioners who have lost a loved one, on March 2nd at 3:30 PM in the Church. Fr. Stafan will be leading the prayer service. One does not need to be a […]
events.name: Bereavement Support Group Coming Events

events.description: True Fashion Show March 29, 2014 from 6:30 – 8:30 PM Show your support! Become a sponsor!
events.name: Help Sponsor the True Fashion Show

events.description: Next Saturday, February 22 the men of St. Timothy’s will be discussing some critical issues facing all men, our families, and our community. As natural leaders in your family you should attend these informal talks to discuss your responsibilities as a Catholic. See the Bulletin for the TMIY discussions.
events.name: That Man Is You

events.description: 40 Days For Life starts March 5th. For more details view 40 Days For Life Flyer.
events.name: 40 Days for Life

events.description: Come join Fr. Bill as he discusses The First Letter of Saint Peter. Tuesdays, February 4 – March 4 at 10 AM OR Thursdays, February 6 – March 6 at 7 PM in the Fr.McGivney Room Click here to view the flyer
events.name: Bible Study with Fr. Bill
